# Domain Killer Blocklist

Automatically generated and updated domain blocklist for network security and ad blocking.

## Usage

**Raw URL for applications:**
```
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pixeljitsu/domain-killer/main/domain-killer.txt
```

**For Little Snitch:**
1. Open Little Snitch Configuration
2. Go to Rules â†’ Subscriptions  
3. Add new subscription with the raw URL above

## Auto-Generated

This blocklist is automatically compiled and updated from multiple sources using a custom bash script.
